content: invisible finish main glove cont d r15 join yarn to the first stitch after the thumb and continue along main section the thumb will be on the right ch1 1sc 1dc repeat to the beginning of the thumb note to avoid gaps on both sides of the thumb just before and after the 4chs you will be picking up a loop from the side of the stitch from the previous round and working it together with the next stitch see pics turn the work slightly pick up a loop from the side of the single_crochet from the previous round and work it into the next single_crochet stitch continue lp stitch into the bottom loop of the 4 chains pick up a loop from the side of the double_crochet from the previous round and slip_stitch into the first single_crochet of the round r16 ch2 1dc 1sc repeat to the last 4 stitches decrease x 2 doing a single_crochet both times join 30 34 r17 ch1 1sc 1dc repeat to end 30 34 note the last single_crochet will be done into a single_crochet from the previous round r18-22 24 lp stitch in all rounds finish with either a slip_stitch or invisible finish 30 34 weave in all ends enjoy your gloves thank you for choosing my pattern please feel free to make and sell gloves if you wish however please do not sell my pattern or claim it as your own © carolanne creations 2020
